mapper.insert: insert into cart(user_id, prod_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_totalPrice, prod_cartAmt) values(#{user_id}, #{prod_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_totalPrice}, #{prod_cartAmt})
mapper.update: update cart set prod_cartAmt=#{prod_cartAmt}, prod_totalPrice=#{prod_totalPrice} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select * from cart where user_id=#{user_id} and prod_id=#{prod_id}
